summary: In 1954, during the French Indochina War, an Eurasian female smuggler and a group of French Foreign Legion mercenaries, infiltrate the enemy territory in order to destroy an arms depot.
cast: Gene Barry|Angie Dickinson|Nat 'King' Cole|Paul Dubov|Lee Van Cleef|George Givot|Gerald Milton|Neyle Morrow|Marcel Dalio|Maurice Marsac|Warren Hsieh|Paul Busch|James Hong|Willie Soo Hoo|Walter Soo Hoo|Weaver Levy|Sasha Harden|Ziva Rodann
title: Corredor hacia China
